mapper.select: select p10_address.* from p10_assets left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id=p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type=4 where p10_assets.assets_id=#{assetsId}

SELECT p10_assets.assets_id, p10_assets.assets_name, p10_assets.assets_type, p10_assets.`type`, p10_assets.`owner`, p10_project.project_id, p10_project.company_code, p10_project.`status`, p10_project.subject_persons, p10_assets_re.assets_re_id, p10_assets_re.assets_source, json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.entityZX_STZX.entityZX_STZX_CCZXCF.entityZX_STZX_CCZXCF_CCZXCF.sealUpCondition' ) AS sealUpCondition, json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.fundingZX_ZJZX.fundingZX_ZJZX_ZJZXDJ.fundingZX_ZJZX_ZJZXDJ_ZJZXDJ.whetherFirstFrozen' ) AS whetherFirstFrozen FROM p10_assets INNER JOIN p10_assets_re ON p10_assets_re.assets_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_assets.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN p10_project ON p10_project.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id and p10_project.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_assets.del_flag = 0
and p10_assets_re.subject_id = #{query.subjectId}

SELECT * FROM p10_assets LEFT JOIN p10_address ON p10_assets.assets_id = p10_address.user_id and p10_address.type = 4 and p10_address.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_assets.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets.assets_id = #{assetsId}

select p10_assets.*,p10_assets_re.assets_source from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id where p10_assets.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.create_casee_id = #{caseeId}
